trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated"> </xref> eventos de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A> methods to provide access to the business object instance before any data operations that are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and business object are performed.
trans-unit.target: A classe ObjectDataSourceEventArgs é usada no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A>métodos para fornecer acesso à instância do objeto de negócios antes de quaisquer operações de dados que estão usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controle e objeto comercial são executadas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A>

trans-unit.source: The business object is set and accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O objeto comercial é definido e acessados usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreating> event, you can create an instance of the business object in custom code instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> performing the instantiation.
trans-unit.target: Adicionando um delegado de manipulador de eventos para lidar com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreating>eventos, você pode criar uma instância do objeto comercial no código personalizado em vez do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>executando a instanciação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want a non-default instance of your business object or to call a non-default constructor to create the instance; the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> always calls the default constructor to create an instance of the business object it works with.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil quando você desejar uma instância não padrão do seu objeto de negócios ou chamar um construtor não padrão para criar a instância; o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>sempre chama o construtor padrão para criar uma instância do objeto comercial que funciona com.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You can also add an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated> event, which enables you to access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any additional initialization or work.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode adicionar um delegado de manipulador de eventos para lidar com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>evento, que permite que você acesse qualquer publicamente exposto aos membros do objeto comercial para executar qualquer inicialização adicional ou trabalho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A> methods are not called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, if the business object method that performs the data operations is `static`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A>métodos não são chamados pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>de controle, se o método do objeto comercial que executa as operações de dados for `static`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controle expõe vários eventos que você pode manipular para trabalhar com o objeto comercial subjacente várias vezes durante o ciclo de vida.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and the associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os eventos e associado <xref:System.EventArgs>classes e delegados de manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: | Evento | EventArgs | EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.|ObjectDataSourceEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre imediatamente antes da instância do objeto comercial é criada. | ObjectDataSourceEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.|ObjectDataSourceEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre imediatamente depois que a instância do objeto comercial é criada. | ObjectDataSourceEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes que os dados são recuperados. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de uma inserção, atualização ou operação de exclusão é executada. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois que os dados são recuperados. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre após a inserção, atualização ou operação de exclusão for concluída. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de um objeto comercial é destruído. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"> </xref> classe usando o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The business object with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> interacts to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de negócios com o qual o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> interage para executar operações de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the business object with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control performs data operations.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que representa o objeto de negócios com a qual o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> controle executa operações de dados.

trans-unit.source: The business object the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> uses to perform data operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto comercial de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> usa para executar operações de dados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, se <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> é passado para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"> </xref>.
